title: Lynx Lays FinTech Tracks to Help Providers Integrate Healthcare, Finance Flows - PYMNTS.com
content: Lynx Lays FinTech Tracks to Help Providers Integrate Healthcare, Finance Flows  PYMNTS.com
description: With the consumerization of healthcare on the rise, Lynx CEO Matt Renfro says embedded FinTech solutions can simplify and speed up healthcare experiences.
